'''15w36c''' is the twenty-first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on September 2, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/09/minecraft-snapshot-15w36a/</ref> to fix a crash involving [[endermen]], as well as [[beacon]] beam rendering, and [[shulker]]'s appearance while in a [[monster spawner]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w36c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|4465|Floating ghast bombs/wither skulls/fire charges
|;dev
|85007|Beacons are 2D.
|85928|The mini-mob of a shulker spawner rotates outside of the spawner cage.
|87881|Crash when looking at enderman.
}}</onlyinclude>
